name: mri_validate_skull_stripped
description: Tool to validate skull stripped MRI images.

inputs.name: MRI Reference
inputs.description: Reference MRI image to compare against.

inputs.name: MRI Test
inputs.description: Test MRI image that has undergone skull stripping.

inputs.name: Weight
inputs.description: Weight parameter, should be greater than 1.

author: FreeSurfer Developers
